title: Getting Started
content:
Getting Started

Start your Semrush journey by completing a few basic tasks. Learn how to level up your online visibility and attract more traffic to your website.

Audit your website

Analyze your website’s technical health, identify issues and get recommendations on how to improve it.

Go to workflow

Conduct keyword research

Find keywords that will bring you the most traffic and help outperform your competitors in search.

Go to workflow

Track your rankings

Monitor your and competitors’ positions and measure the success of your SEO campaigns.

Go to workflow

Create content that brings you more traffic

Create SEO optimized content that will be loved by users and search engines alike.

Go to workflow

Optimize Backlinks

Learn which backlinks might be hurting your visibility and find new high-quality link building prospects.

Go to workflow

Run competitive analysis

Get insights into your competitors’ marketing strategy, learn to avoid their mistakes and replicate their success.

Go to workflow

Watch our introduction video
Learn our hot tools

Explore Semrush tools to find the best solution to your digital marketing challenges. Here are the most popular tools we recommend you to start with.

Position Tracking

Track and compare your domain's daily rankings.

Read manual

Domain Overview

Get a full picture of any domain's visibility.

Read manual

Organic Research

Win the SERPs through studying your competitors.

Read manual

Site Audit

Find and fix on-site issues and improve your rankings.

Read manual

Backlink Gap

Find new link building prospects.

Read manual

Keyword Magic Tool

Research a database of 20 billion keywords.

Read manual
